Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Normal
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route at 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.
